daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez opens Hobbs Cafe at 8am everyday, and works at the counter until 8pm, at which point she closes the cafe.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez is a cafe owner of Hobbs Cafe who loves to make people feel welcome. She is always looking for ways to make the cafe a place where people can come to relax and enjoy themselves.
currently: Isabella Rodriguez is planning on having a Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe with her customers on February 14th, 2023 at 5pm. She is gathering party material, and is telling everyone to join the party at Hobbs Cafe on February 14th, 2023, from 5pm to 7pm.
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 6am.
daily_req: 1) Wake up and complete the morning routine at home, including a quick breakfast (coffee and toast or fruit) before heading to Hobbs Cafe. (early morning)
2) Open Hobbs Cafe at 8am, start the coffee service, greet customers, and place Valentine’s Day décor to prep for tomorrow's party. (morning)
3) Maria Lopez visits Hobbs Cafe to study; Isabella welcomes her warmly and chats about tomorrow's Valentine’s event, collecting ideas for decorations. (late morning)
4) Lunch service at the cafe; take a short break for a light lunch; review remaining party-supply needs and inventory. (midday)
5) Head to The Willows Market and Harvey Oak Supply Store to pick up heart-themed decor, napkins, candles, and other party supplies; text Klaus and Maria about tomorrow's plans. (afternoon)
6) Finalize Valentine’s Day party setup: seating arrangement for 5-7pm guests, prepare a welcome sign, and assemble a simple playlist. (late afternoon)
7) Close the cafe at 8pm; enjoy dinner at The Rose and Crown Pub with a friend or Maria Lopez; debrief and confirm any last-minute party details. (evening)
8) Wind down at home: review tomorrow’s agenda, set reminders, and head to bed around 11pm. (night)

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: Stay in bed until wake up time.
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Get rest and prepare for the day.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org: completing morning routine and breakfast at home

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: hygiene, grooming, dressing, and a quick breakfast (coffee and toast or fruit) at home
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Finish personal morning routine and have a quick breakfast before leaving for Hobbs Cafe

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: unlock doors, start coffee station, stock cups/napkins, arrange pastries, set up Valentine’s decor
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Get the cafe ready for 8am opening by starting coffee service setup, turning on equipment, and placing Valentine’s décor.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org: Unlock cafe doors and begin coffee service
the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: unlock doors, start coffee machine, verify pastry display, ensure greeting area is tidy for customers
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Prepare the cafe for opening by unlocking doors and starting the coffee station for the morning rush.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org: Welcome Maria Lopez and brainstorm Valentine's decorations
the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: talk about decor concepts, preferences, and requirements; note ideas and create a preliminary decoration checklist
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Discuss and collect decoration ideas for tomorrow's Valentine’s event with Maria Lopez.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org: Shop for Valentine decor and coordinate with Maria and Klaus
the Ville:The Willows Market and Pharmacy:store:grocery store shelf

planned_intra_task_travel_path: the Ville:The Willows Market and Pharmacy:store
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: Visit The Willows Market and Harvey Oak Supply Store to buy heart-themed decor, napkins, candles, and other party supplies; text Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller with tomorrow's plans; update decor checklist
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Acquire heart-themed decorations and supplies and inform Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller about tomorrow's plans

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org: Lunch service and quick inventory review

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: Lunch service, short lunch break, and inventory check/update for party supplies
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Serve customers at lunch, take a short break, and review remaining party-supply needs for the afternoon setup.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org: Shop for Valentine decor and coordinate with Maria and Klaus
the Ville:The Willows Market and Pharmacy:store:grocery store shelf

planned_intra_task_travel_path: the Ville:The Willows Market and Pharmacy:store
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: Visit The Willows Market and Harvey Oak Supply Store to buy heart-themed decor, napkins, candles, etc.; text Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller with tomorrow's plans; update decor checklist
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Acquire heart-themed decorations and supplies and inform Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller about tomorrow's plans.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: Finalize seating plan for 5-7pm, prepare a welcome sign, assemble a simple playlist, and note any last-minute decor tweaks; confirm changes with Maria and Klaus if needed
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Complete seating, signage, and music prep for the event.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org: Close Hobbs Cafe and prep for tomorrow

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: Lock doors, turn off equipment, tally cash, update inventory, tidy dining area, restock as needed, leave notes for tomorrow, and brief Maria/Klaus if needed
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Secure the cafe and finalize end-of-day tasks to be ready for tomorrow's operations

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org: Evening dinner and debrief with Maria Lopez
the Ville:The Rose and Crown Pub:pub:microphone

planned_intra_task_travel_path: the Ville:The Rose and Crown Pub:pub
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: dinner at pub, casual debrief, and finalizing tomorrow's party logistics with Maria Lopez
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Enjoy dinner at The Rose and Crown Pub and confirm any last-minute Valentine’s Day party details with Maria.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: Travel home from pub, review tomorrow's schedule, set reminders, prepare belongings for tomorrow, and complete a light bedtime routine (wash face, brush teeth) before bed.
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Review tomorrow's Valentine’s Day agenda, set reminders, and begin the bedtime routine to prepare for a restful night.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: Review tomorrow's agenda, set reminders/alarms, and start bedtime routine
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Confirm tomorrow's schedule, set reminders, and complete bedtime prep.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: wash face, brush teeth, skincare, change into pajamas, set tomorrow's alarm
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Begin the final personal care and prep for sleep to promote a restful night.

f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.in_scope: sleep through the night without leaving bed or performing tasks; no errands or conversations; lights off and phone silenced
f_daily_schedule_hourly_org.task_intent: Fall asleep and rest through the night until wake time.
